event.title: was largely destroyed by a wildfire in 2012

data.event: Lower Rochester is still accessible to visitors, but was largely destroyed by a wildfire in 2012; Upper Rochester has been buried under mine tailings of the more recent Coeur Rochester open pit mine.

event.title: a discovery by Joseph Nenzel of rich silver ore in 1912

data.event: Although there was always a presence of sorts in Rochester from 1861 on, it was not until a discovery by Joseph Nenzel of rich silver ore in 1912 that Rochester became a true boom town.

event.title: November 1912, as word of the find

data.event: By November 1912, as word of the find spread, people streamed into the area.
